::: {#about-block}

 Siju K S is a Faculty member in the Department of Mathematics, Saintgits College of Engineering (Autonomous), Kottayam. Handling classes in Pure, Applied, and Computational Mathematics. Presently serving as a Resource Person for the AIML Developer course offered by IIT Madras & Gov. of Kerala and an Institutional Mentor for `Intel-unnati programme`. Also serving as a Data Analytics consultant for Finance, Economics , Social Sciences and Engineering.

As part of the professional life I have over 18 years of experience in Teaching that involved Undergraduate, Graduate, Post Graduate and Professional courses in Science , Engineering & Technology.

During my stint at computational mathematics, I have trained through ToTs from prominent institutes like IIT(M), Intel , and ASDC (Gov.of Kerala) in modern technologies like Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning and Business Analytics. Currently handling skill training related to Research, AI and Analytics services of research scholars.

I led many FDPs, STTPs, and training programmes in Applied Mathematics and Artificial Intelligence.

## Research

- Pursuing research in Artificial Intelligence under the Faculty of Amrita School of Artificial Intelligence at the Center of Excellence in Computational Engineering & Networking, Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, Coimbatore.
- Co-PI of the project _Meenachil River Water Quality Management & Flood Prediction Using AI_.
